SELECT * FROM (SELECT inner_table.* , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM +1 AS RNUM FROM( SELECT R.RP_NO , R.RP_BY_USERID , U.NICKNAME , R.RP_TYPE , R.RP_CONTENT , R.RP_IMAGE , R.RP_REGDATE
, B.BD_NO , B.BD_NAME , U2.USER_ID AS TARGET_ID , U2.USER_NAME AS TARGET_NAME , U2.NICKNAME AS TARGET_NICKNAME
, RE.REPLY_NO , RE.REPLY_CONTENT , U2.USER_ID AS TARGET_ID , U2.USER_NAME AS TARGET_NAME , U2.NICKNAME AS TARGET_NICKNAME , RE.BD_NO
, U2.USER_ID AS TARGET_ID , U2.USER_NAME AS TARGET_NAME , U2.NICKNAME AS TARGET_NICKNAME
, M.MM_NO , M.MM_NAME , U2.USER_ID AS TARGET_ID , U2.USER_NAME AS TARGET_NAME , U2.NICKNAME AS TARGET_NICKNAME
, R.RP_CATEGORY , R.RP_RESULT_STATE , R.RP_RESULT_UPDATE , R.STATE_REASON FROM REPORT R , USERS U , USERS U2
, BOARD B
, REPLY RE
, MOIM M
WHERE R.RP_BY_USERID = U.USER_ID
AND R.RP_TARGETBD = B.BD_NO AND B.BD_WRITER = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND R.RP_TARGETRE = RE.REPLY_NO AND RE.REPLY_WRITER = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND R.RP_TARGET = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND R.RP_TARGETMM = M.MM_NO AND M.MM_CONSTRUCTOR = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND M.MM_NAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY U.USER_ID
, B.BD_NO
, RE.REPLY_NO
, U2.USER_ID
, M.MM_NO
ORDER BY R.RP_NO ) inner_table, (select @rownum := 0) as R )tables WHERE rnum between #{map.search.startRowNum} and #{map.search.endRowNum}
SELECT RP_RESULT_STATE , RP_RESULT_UPDATE , STATE_REASON , RP_NO FROM REPORT WHERE RP_NO = #{report.reportNo}

, BOARD B

AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND R.RP_TARGET = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND U2.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
AND R.RP_TARGETMM = M.MM_NO AND M.MM_CONSTRUCTOR = U2.USER_ID
AND U2.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{map.search.searchKeyword},'%')
